product.name: Lipstick
product.brief_description: Maybelline Superstay Matte Ink Longlasting Liquid, Nude Lipstick, Up to 12 Hour Wear, Non Drying, 65 Seductress
product.p1: Available at a lower price from other sellers that may not offer free Prime delivery.
product.p2: Note: This item is eligible for FREE Click and Collect without a minimum order subject to availability.
product.p3: Lipstick with a velvety matte finish, lasts up to 16 hours thanks to its elastic ink technology
product.p4: Non-transferable coverage, Formula enriched with highly concentrated pigments for intense and vibrant colour, Available in several shades
product.p5: The arrow applicator allows for a precise line to be drawn and glides over your lips, Remove with a two-phase waterproof formula
product.p6: Liquid formula with applicator for precise and smooth application, Quick drying, Dermatologically tested, Odourless
product.p7: Contents: 1x Superstay Matte Ink Maybelline New York Lip Ink, Shade: Seductress (65), Volume: 5 ml
product.p10: Item dimensions L x W x H 18 x 18 x 98 millimetres
